text: Albert Lincoln Roker Jr. (born August 20, 1954) is an American weatherman and an actor. He is known for being a presenter on the television program Today. In September 2020, Roker was diagnosed with prostate cancer.Al Roker reveals he has prostate cancer ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television presenters Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:American bloggers
title: Al Roker
